price: 34. Waxay odhan: Ammaan (oo dhan) iyo mahad waxaa leh Alle, ee naga tagsiiyey murugo (oo dhan). Hubaal Rabbigayo waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Mahdin Badan.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī adhhaba ʿannā al-ḥazana inna rabbanā laghafūrun shakūrun
